title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Magnitsky Sanctions and Reparation
purpose: To raise the profile of human rights and anti-corruption sanctions within parliament, to examine specific situations where sanctions may be appropriate, and to consider changes to the operation of the UKâ€™s Magnitsky Sanctions legislation to improve its efficiency and impact.
